arts.ttl: Empoli-Venezia, a huge clash for the safety zone
arts.sum: If only the goals scored by Italian players in all matches of Serie A this season were considered, Empoli would have 31 more points than they currently have (55 v 24), the highest such difference among all teams in Serie A in 2024-25, and they would be in third position behind Fiorentina and Atalanta in the standing. Empoli have never played a Serie A match on Easter Sunday, while Venezia have already done so on six occasions, obtaining one win, one draw and four defeats (one of those defeats was an awarded game, on 24 March 1940 against Milan, after the match had ended with a score of 0-0).
Joe Casey has taken a look at the fixture list for matchday 33 of the Serie A season, picking out a score prediction for each match.
